analyzed: prameya adhyāyaḥ
dvitīyam āhnikam

original: nyā. pa. prame. 9 atra yadyapi pramāviṣayaḥ prameyamiti vyutpattyā āropitākāravyavacchedārthayā anāropitarūpaṃ sarvaṃ prameyam,
analyzed: atra yadi api pramā viṣayaḥ prameyam iti vyutpattyā āropita ākāra vyavaccheda arthayā anāropita rūpam sarvam prameyam

original: tathāpi niḥśreyasāntaraṅgatayā tadarthibhiḥ prakarṣeṇa meyaṃ prameyamiha vivakṣim /
analyzed: tathā api niḥśreyasa antaraṅga tayā tad arthibhiḥ prakarṣeṇa meyam prameyam iha
yad viṣayeṇa bhrameṇa saṃsarāmaḥ
yad viṣayeṇa ca tattva jñānena apavarjyemahi
tat iha naḥ prakarṣeṇa meyam prameyam
tat ca dvādaśavidham uktam ākṣapāde ātma śarīra indriya artha buddhi manaḥ pravṛtti doṣa pretyabhāva phala duḥkha apavargāḥ prameyam iti
tatra cetanaḥ ātmā
sa dvidhā ariśvarā unīśvaraḥ iti
jagat kartār iśvaraḥ
jagat vyāpāra rahitaḥ cetanā unīśvaraḥ
yat caitanya samāna adhikaraṇam yat apṛthak siddham yat dravyam
tat tasya śarīram
tat dvividham karma jam
a karma jam ca iti
ādyam asmat ādīnām
dvitīyam īśvara ādīnām
sāttvika ahaṅkāra upādānakam dravyam indriyam
tat ekādaśavidham pañca jñāna indriyāṇi
manaḥ ca iti
indriya gocarāḥ iha arthāḥ

original: te ca śabdādayo guṇāḥ tadviśiṣṭāni ca /
analyzed: te ca śabda ādayaḥ guṇāḥ tad viśiṣṭāni ca
artha prakāśaḥ buddhiḥ
smṛti ādi karaṇam indriyam manaḥ
manaḥ vāc kāyānām puṇya apuṇya rūpaḥ vyāpāraḥ iha pravṛttiḥ
tathāvidha pravṛtti hetavaḥ doṣāḥ
te ca saṃgrahāt rāga dveṣa mohāḥ
pūrva deham vihāya uttara deha prāptiḥ pretyabhāvaḥ
pravṛtti sādhyam phalam
tat eva puruṣeṇa pravṛtti phala tayā uddiṣṭam prayojanam
pratikūla vedanīyam duḥkham

original: tatra sukhatatsādhanādikamapi viṣasaṃpṛktamadhuvat prabhūtānarthānuṣaṅgitvād duḥkhameva mumukṣuṇā bhāvyamiti tasyāpi pratikūlavedanīyatvam
analyzed: tatra sukha tad sādhana ādikam api viṣa saṃpṛkta madhu vat prabhūta anartha anuṣaṅgi tvāt duḥkham eva mumukṣuṇā bhāvyam iti tasya api pratikūla vedanīya tvam
sa ca svābhāvika ātma svarūpa āvirbhāva pūrvaka samasta vibhūti guṇa viśiṣṭa niratiśaya ānanda brahma anubhava garbhaḥ iti paramapuruṣa arthaḥ
tad pūrvakaḥ vā tādṛśa brahma anubhava upavargaḥ iti

original: etadeva ca prameyaṃ saṃgrahāccaturdhā vibhajya kecidanusaṃdadhate--- 'heyam,
analyzed: etat eva ca prameyam saṃgrahāt caturdhā vibhajya kecid anusaṃdadhate aheyam
tasya nivartakam
hānam
tasya upāyaḥ iti

original: ye tu kaṇacaraṇādayaḥ ṣaṭsaptādirūpeṇa sarvān padārthān vibhajya parīkṣante,
analyzed: ye tu kaṇa caraṇa ādayaḥ ṣaṣ sapta ādi rūpeṇa sarvān padārthān vibhajya parīkṣante
te sāmānya viśeṣa samavāya ādīnām padārtha antara tva pratikṣepeṇa nirastāḥ
tatas ca dravya guṇa karmāṇi trīṇi eva avaśiṣyante

original: tatrāpi karmaṇaḥ saṃpratipannaguṇātiriktatvapakṣepi saṃskārādiguṇāvāntaraviśeṣavad guṇapakṣakakṣīkārāt dvau padārthau /
analyzed: tatra api karmaṇaḥ saṃpratipanna guṇa atirikta tva pakṣe pi saṃskāra ādi guṇa avāntara viśeṣa vat guṇa pakṣa kakṣīkārāt dvau padārthau
tatra ca guṇa śabdasya apṛthak siddha viśeṣaṇa mātra vyutpannasya tathāvidheṣu keṣucid dravyeṣu api
vṛtteḥ dravya guṇa rūpeṇa vibhāga anaucityāt dravyam adravyam iti eva padārtha vibhāgam ādriyāmaheḥ
idṛśasya tu vicārasya apavarge paraṃparayā upayogaḥ

original: mumukṣūṇāṃ pradhānatamaṃ tu prameyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ brahmaikameveti manvāno bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ--- “athāto brahmajijñāsā” ityupakramya tadeva saprakāraṃ
analyzed: mumukṣūṇām pradhānatamam tu prameyam viśiṣṭam brahma ekam eva iti manvānaḥ bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ atha atas brahma jijñāsāḥ iti upakramya tat eva sa prakāram
tad prakāra tayā eva anyat prameyam

original: kecittu dehātmavivekakramānusāreṇa “bhoktā bhogyaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā” iti śrutiprakriyayā ca tridhā tattvaṃ vibhajya cintayanti,
analyzed: kecid tu deha ātma viveka krama anusāreṇa bhoktā bhogyam preritāram ca matvā iti śruti prakriyayā ca tridhā tattvam vibhajya cintayanti
tatra api sa prakāra dravya cintanāt adravya cintā api antarbhavati
tad tulya nyāya tayā kāla cintā ca

original: tadabhiprāyeṇa kālasya padārthaviśeṣaṇatayaiva samastavastupratītyantarbhāvānna pṛthagastitvādayo vaktavyāḥ,
analyzed: tad abhiprāyeṇa kālasya padārtha viśeṣaṇa tayā eva samasta vastu pratīti antarbhāvāt na pṛthak astitva ādayaḥ vaktavyāḥ
na ca parihartavyāḥ
kālaḥ asti na asti iti vyavahāraḥ vyavahartṝṇām jāti ādi astitva nāstitva vyavahāra tulyaḥ iti

original: jainanirākaraṇasamaye bhāṣyakārairuktamātataśca brahmaikameva tattvamiti vā cidacidīśvarabhedena
analyzed: jaina nirākaraṇa samaye bhāṣyakāraiḥ uktam ā tatas ca brahma ekam eva tattvam iti vā cit acit īśvara bhedena

original: trīṇi tattvānīti vā paśyatāṃ na kaśvidviśeṣaḥ,
analyzed: trīṇi tattvāni iti vā paśyatām na kaśvid viśeṣaḥ
svarūpa bhedasya viśiṣṭa aikyasya ca ubhayeṣām abhimata tvāt
atas eva pradhānapuruṣa vyakta kālāḥ tu pravibhāgaśaḥ
rūpāṇi sthiti sarga anta vyakti sadbhāva hetavaḥ

original: ityādyanusāreṇa caturdhā pañcadhā vā vibhajya cintayatāṃ kāryaviśeṣaiḥ saha pañcaṣaṭsaptaviṃśatyādisaṃkhyāṃ niveśayatāṃ ca pūrvāviśeṣa eva
analyzed: ityādi anusāreṇa caturdhā pañcadhā vā vibhajya cintayatām kārya viśeṣaiḥ saha pañca ṣaṣ saptaviṃśati ādi saṃkhyām niveśayatām ca pūrvā viśeṣe eva
śrūyate ca tam ṣaṅviṃśakam iti āhuḥ saptaviṃśam atha apare
puruṣam nirguṇam sāṃravyam atharvaśirasaḥ viduḥ
iti
prāpyam prāptā
prāpti upāyaḥ
nivartyam

original: phalaṃ ceti kecit pañcadhā prameyaṃ parisaṃcakṣate /
analyzed: phalam ca iti kecid pañcadhā prameyam parisaṃcakṣate
saṃbandha viśeṣeṇa saha anye ṣoḍhā iti

original: nyā. pa. prame. 10 athāyamaparaḥ pravṛttyarthaḥ saṃgrahonuṣṭhānaparihārāntaraṅgaḥ;
analyzed: atha ayam aparaḥ pravṛtti arthaḥ saṃgraha anuṣṭhāna parihāra antaraṅgaḥ
tathā hi hitam ahitam ca prakarṣeṇa meyam
tatra laukika hita ahitayoḥ anvaya vyatireka āyurveda nīti śāstra ādikam pramāṇam
tat api yoga sādhana bhūta śarīra rakṣaṇa artham mumukṣuṇā api śruti smṛti ādi avirodhena anusaraṇīyam
alaukika hita ahitayoḥ tu vedāḥ pramāṇam
tad upabṛṃhaṇa tayā smṛti itihāsa purāṇāni ca
yat ca śruti vihitam
tat akhilam api yathā adhikāram hitam
yat ca tat niṣiddham
tat akhilam api ahitam

original: nanvabhicārādikarmaṇāmanarthahetūnāṃ kṣudrapuruṣārthasādhanānāṃ ca kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kathaṃ hitatvam ?
analyzed: nanu abhicāra ādi karmaṇām anartha hetūnām kṣudra puruṣa artha sādhanānām ca kāmyānām karmaṇām katham hita tvam
ucyate adhikāri viśeṣam apekṣya hi sarvaḥ vidhiḥ niṣedhaḥ ca
yathoktam traiguṇya viṣayāḥ vedāḥ iti

original: yo hi sukhaṃ duḥkhanivṛttiṃ cecchati tasya tatsādhanamapekṣamāṇasya laukikeṣu sādhaneṣu
analyzed: yaḥ hi sukham duḥkha nivṛttim ca icchati tasya tat sādhanam apekṣamāṇasya laukikeṣu sādhaneṣu
pravṛttasya teṣām niraya ādi hetu bhūta anartha hetu tvena tad parihārāya anartha hetu tva rahitāḥ
sukha ādi upāyāḥ pratipādyante

original: evaṃ kāmyakarmāṇi pāralaukikāni dṛṣṭajātīyatadadhikaphalārthatayā dṛṣṭānarthāvahasukhapravṛttipratibandhaupayikatvād hitānyeva rāgiṇām /
analyzed: evam kāmya karmāṇi pāralaukikāni dṛṣṭa jātīya tad adhika phala arthatayā dṛṣṭa anartha āvaha sukha pravṛtti pratibandha aupayika tvāt hitāni eva rāgiṇām
tathā aihalaukikāni api citra ādīni
kārīrī ādīni tu jagat hitāni api
abhicāra karmaṇaḥ api hiṃsā ādi yuktasya api svarūpataḥ nā anartha hetu tvam
tad aṅga paśu hiṃsā ādeḥ agnīṣomīya ādi vat vidhi prāpta tvāt
api tu sva sādhyena aprāpta viṣaya vadha ādinā
tad apekṣayā ca abhicāraḥ niṣidhyate
saḥ api hi kvacid avaśya kartavyaḥ eva
ṣaṭsu anabhicaran patet ityādi darśanāt

original: ataśca mumukṣorapi rakṣakakṣatriyādyabhāve rākṣasādyabhibhave cātmarakṣaṇārthamabhicāraḥ kartavya eva,
analyzed: atas ca mumukṣoḥ api rakṣaka kṣatriya ādi abhāve rākṣasa ādi abhibhave ca ātma rakṣaṇa artham abhicāraḥ kartavyaḥ eva
sarvatas eva ātmānam gopāyet iti śāstrāt
anyathā ahar ahar anuṣṭheyasya aprayāṇāt anuvartanīyasya karma ādeḥ uccheda prasaṅgena upāya aniṣpatteḥ mokṣa asiddhi prasaṅgāt
vṛṣṭi anna ādi dṛṣṭārthāni ca sarvāṇi upāsana niṣpatti aupayika tayā tad tad apekṣāyām anuṣṭheyāni

original: pāralaukikāni tu tatphalābhisaṃdhiviraheṇa karmayogānuṣṭhānadaśāyāṃ nityanaimittikairekīkṛtya kartavyāni /
analyzed: pāralaukikāni tu tad phala abhisaṃdhi viraheṇa karmayoga anuṣṭhāna daśāyām nitya naimittikaiḥ ekīkṛtya kartavyāni
naimittikāni hi sarvāṇi prasakta anartha parihāra artha tayā sarva hitāni eva
evam nityāni
uttara karma adhikāra ārtha tvāt akaraṇa nimitta pratyavāya parihāra ārtha tvāt ca
atas śruti vihitam sva varṇa āśrama ucitam sarvam hitam eva

original: ata eva hi smaranti--- “śāstraṃ hi vatsalataraṃ mātāpitṛsahasrataḥ” iti /
analyzed: atas eva hi smaranti śāstram hi vatsalataram mātā pitṛ sahasrataḥ iti
evam sthite pravāha anādi sāmagrī cakra vaśāt aniyata samaya samāgata sakala saiddhāntika samālambanīya su car
ita paripāka nivṛtta pratibandha parama puruṣa kaṭākṣa viśeṣa samunmiṣita sattva sāmarthyena
kara tala āmalaka vat ālokita heya upādeya vibhāgasya anādi ananta bahuvidha durviṣaha duḥkha anuṣaṅga dūṣita alpa asthira sāṃsārika sukha maya viṣa madhu viraktasya
yathāśakti varṇa āśrama ucita nitya naimittika niṣiddha parihāra sahakṛtam darśana samāna ākāra dhruva anusmṛti rūpam
bhagavat upāsanam hitatamam vihitam
tat ca sat akṣara nyāsa vaiśvānara madhu bhūma dahara ādi bhedena bahuvidham traivarṇika sarva āśrama sādhyam
tasya ca mahānīya viṣaya niratiśaya prīti rūpa tvena bhakti śabda vācya tvam

original: ayameva ca paramo yogastrayyantānuvidhāyiṣu sarveṣu mokṣaśāstreṣu pratipādyate;
analyzed: ayam eva ca paramaḥ yogaḥ trayī anta anuvidhāyiṣu sarveṣu mokṣa śāstreṣu pratipādyate

original: yathāha bhagavān parāśaraḥ--- “ātmaprayatnasāpekṣā viśiṣṭā yā manogatiḥ /
analyzed: yathā āha bhagavān parāśaraḥ ātma prayatna sāpekṣā viśiṣṭā yā manaḥ gatiḥ
tasyāḥ brahmaṇi saṃyogaḥ yogaḥ iti abhidhīyate
iti

original: smarati ca bhagavān śāṇḍilyarḥ--- “idṛśaḥ paramātmāyaṃ pratyagātmāva tathedṛśaḥ /
analyzed: smarati ca bhagavān śāṇḍilyarḥ idṛśaḥ paramātmā ayam tathā īdṛśaḥ
tad saṃbandha anusaṃdhānam iti yogaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
iti
tatra cit acit viveka ādi mātre sāṃkhyam upakurute
itikartavya tā viśeṣe karmakāṇḍa ādayaḥ
sarvatra eva pañca rātram
niṣiddha kāmya vargeṣu vyartha anāvaśyakeṣu ca
śama ādi vidhiḥ anyatra pravṛttyā na virudhyate

original: soyamevaṃvidhaḥ paramayogākhyo dharmaḥ “mayyeva mana ādhatsva” iti gīyate /
analyzed: saḥ ayam evaṃvidhaḥ parama yoga ākhyaḥ dharmaḥ mayi eva manaḥ ādhatsva iti gīyate
tad aśaktasya

original: “atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram /
analyzed: atha cittam samādhātum na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram
abhyāsa yogena gataḥ mām iccha āptum dhanañjaya
abhyāseṣu asamarthaḥ asi mad karma paramaḥ bhava
ityādinā pūrva parvāṇi vidhīyante
yaḥ prīti pūrva bhagavat asādhāraṇa karmaṇi api na samarthaḥ
tasya viṣaya rasa vaimukhya jananāya samasta vaiṣayika sukha śeṣi tvena cirataram anusaṃhitasya api
sva ātmanaḥ sāṃsārika samasta sukha samadhika ānanda svarūpam ālokayitum āntara cakṣuḥ virodhi timira paṭala pāṭanāya
jñāna karma yoga ākhye dve bheṣaje
tatra ātma cintana rūpaḥ jñāna yogaḥ tad ālokanena antaraṅga bhūtaḥ
tatra api asamarthasya tad adhikāra siddhi artham karmayogaḥ

original: tena tatra siddhādhikārasyāpi śiṣṭatayā vyapadeśyasyāntargatātmajñānaḥ karmayoga eva kāryaḥ /
analyzed: tena tatra siddha adhikārasya api śiṣṭa tayā vyapadeśyasya antargata ātma jñānaḥ karmayogaḥ eva kāryaḥ
anyathā jñāna yoga aśakta akṛtsna vedi puruṣa buddhi bheda janana mūla mahattara durita vaśena jñāna yogaḥ upi pratibadhyeta

original: tādṛśenaiva ca karmayogena sukaratvādiguṇavatā cirataramanuṣṭhitena jñānayogavyavadhānamantareṇāpyātmāvalokanaṃ sidhyati /
analyzed: tādṛśena eva ca karmayogena sukara tva ādi guṇavatā cirataram anuṣṭhitena jñāna yoga vyavadhānam antareṇa api ātma avalokanam sidhyati
karma yoge ipi asamarthaḥ tu vikalam api karma yogam ārabheta
na iha abhikrama nāśaḥ usti pratyavāyaḥ na vidyate
svalpam api asya dharmasya trāyate mahataḥ bhayāt
ityādibhiḥ vaiṅkalya viccheda ādi saṃbhave pi phala avinābhāva ādi pratipādanāt
prakrama mātreṇa api prasannaḥ bhagavān pauṣkalyam āpādayati

original: sarveṣu cāmīṣu parvasu tattatsāmagrīcakraghaṭanāya tattatphalapradānāya ca sa eva hi śaraṇamanusaraṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: sarveṣu ca amīṣu parvasu tad tad sāmagrī cakra ghaṭanāya tad tad phala pradānāya ca saḥ eva hi śaraṇam anusaraṇīyaḥ

original: tathā cāmananti--- “sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ” iti /
analyzed: tathā ca āmananti sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ iti
saḥ eva paramapuruṣaḥ vaśīkārya kāṣṭhā parama prāpyaḥ ca iti arthaḥ
tasya ca vaśīkaraṇam tad śaraṇa āgatiḥ eva iti bhāṣyam
evam hitatamasya upāsanasya diś mātram darśitam
phalam ca apavarga rūpam prāk eva lakṣitam

anyeṣām tu deha viccheda mātra sahasra yuvati saṃbhoga samasta alīka viṣaya vijñāna saṃtāna uccheda vāsanā atyanta virāma viṣaya uparāga vaidhurya nitya ūrdhva gamana sakala loka mastaka upari niviṣṭa sādhāraṇa deha viśeṣa anupraveśa nirāvaraṇa tva sva ānanda anubhava svātantrya lābha śiva sārūpya śiva āpatti cicchakti pariśeṣa avidyā nivṛtti upādhi nivṛtti sakala vaiśeṣika guṇa uccheda prabhṛtayaḥ
śārīraka paryantaiḥ śāstraiḥ pratikṣepyā
iti tatra tatra vistaraḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: iha tu pramāṇacintāyāḥ paramaprayojanaṃ darśayituṃ prameyasya saṃgrahoktiḥ,
analyzed: iha tu pramāṇa cintāyāḥ parama prayojanam darśayitum prameyasya saṃgraha uktiḥ
sa parikara pramāṇa maryādā pratipādana para tvāt nyāya vistara śāstrasya iti

original: nyā. pa. prame. 11 svātantryeṇa mitaṃ sukhetaratayā yadbhāti jantoridaṃ sarvaṃ yasya vibhūtirivyavasitaṃ svādaṃ vyanakti svakam /
analyzed: svātantryeṇa mitam sukha itara tayā yat bhāti jantoḥ idam sarvam yasya vibhūtiḥ i vyavasitam svādam vyanakti svakam

original: antaḥsvāntamanantanandathunidhirmedodṛśāṃ mādṛśā- māvirbhāvayatu svayaṃ sa bhagavānātmānamātmeśvaraḥ //
analyzed: antar svāntam ananta nandathu nidhiḥ medaḥ dṛśām mādṛśāḥ mā āvirbhāvayatu svayam sa bhagavān ātmānam ātma īśvaraḥ

original: yatrodāsata jaiminiprabhṛtayaḥ śrutyarthacintāparāḥ yasyāṃ kandalayanti mandamatayaḥ pāriplavān viplavān /
analyzed: yatra udāsata jaimini prabhṛtayaḥ śruti artha cintā parāḥ yasyām kandalayanti manda matayaḥ pāriplavān viplavān

original: viśveṣāmiha veṅkaṭeśaviduṣā viśrāntaye vādināṃ prācī nītiṣu paryaśodhi saraṇiḥ pracchāyaniṣkaṇṭakā //
analyzed: viśveṣām iha veṅkaṭeśa viduṣā viśrāntaye vādinām prācī nītiṣu paryaśodhi saraṇiḥ pracchāya niṣkaṇṭakā

original: śuddhiṃ bibhrati mādṛśāṃ bhaṇitayaścūḍānvaye kevalaṃ prānte miśramabhāṇi nītinipuṇaiḥ kiṃ teṣvamantavyatā /
analyzed: śuddhim bibhrati mādṛśām bhaṇitayaḥ cūḍā anvaye kevalam prānte miśram abhāṇi nīti nipuṇaiḥ kim teṣu amantavya tā

original: yuktaṃ vargayuge vimṛśya saradhāpuṣpakramaṃ yauktikai- raṅgīkartumaśakyanihnavaguṇagrantho nibandho mama //
analyzed: yuktam varga yuge vimṛśya saradhā puṣpa kramam yauktikaiḥ raṅgīkartum aśakya nihnava guṇa granthaḥ nibandhaḥ mama
nirūḍha nigama traye nikhila loka cintāmaṇau prasattim upaseduṣi praṇidadhāna bhāva āspade

original: ratiṃ bhajati bhāvanā layamivopayāti drutaṃ ramāvasumatīsahācaritadharmaṇi brahmaṇi //
analyzed: ratim bhajati bhāvanā layam iva upayāti drutam ramā vasumatī sahā carita dharmaṇi brahmaṇi

original: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau prameyādhyāye dvitīyamāhnikam
analyzed: iti śrī kavi tārkikasiṃhasya sarva tantra svatantrasya śrīmat veṅkaṭanāthasya vedānta ācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau prameya adhyāye dvitīyam āhnikam
samāptaḥ ca pañcamaḥ udhyāyaḥ
śāstram ca parisamāptam
śrīmate nigama anta mahā deśikāya namaḥ
